de.xeinfach.kafenio
Class KafenioControllerApplet

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Panel
              java.applet.Applet
                  javax.swing.JApplet
                      de.xeinfach.kafenio.KafenioControllerApplet
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class KafenioControllerApplet
extends javax.swing.JApplet
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

Description: This class provides the possibility to call the save-content method in all currently running KafenioApplets.

Author:
Karsten Pawlik

Serialized Form
